message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is more equitable. Think carefully, the value decreases each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my new offer.

I'm still not convinced by your offers. Inflation is hurting me more, so I'll try to get a bit more while I can.
